TopicTitle: Can we change which MPL hatch is used?

Articles.Content: Lanpont and Nabie seem mighty confused. They keep departing the MPL through the wrong hatch...and upside down to boot! The MPL is right side up and they climb up to the accessible hatch when returning, without any issues. Good thing it's Minmus or somebody is going to get hurt falling off the Gigantor!
Instead of clicking the portrait to send to EVA, click on the hatch itself and select EVA from there? Does that help?

3 hours ago, pincushionman said:

Instead of clicking the portrait to send to EVA, click on the hatch itself and select EVA from there? Does that help?

It always used to, for sure.  Haven't tried it in 1.1.3 but they certainly used to use whichever hatch you clicked.

Yep, that works. I was RIGHT clicking the hatch, out of habit to bring up some kind of menu. LEFT click gives you the option to EVA and a choice of Kerbals to do so with.

Thanks!
